resources.string: PALS is an abbreviation from Public Accomodation Location Service, an application that can be used to find nearby ATM, gas station, and repair shop in Depok.
How far the radius coverage provided by the PALS application?

The radius coverage that provided by PALS are 300 meters to 1.5 km from user\'s current location, but if the location is not found within those radius, user can make it display all location to show all location.
Why I get \"Cannot Detect Your Location\" message?

Those message is shown if application cannot detect your current location. Please wait for a minute or restart the application. If this message still appear, that possible something wrong with your GPS or other positioning devices.
Why I get permission dialog when running the application?

Those dialog appear if you use Android device with Android OS version 6.0 (Marshmallow). just allow the required permissions and the dialog won\'t show again. If you deny the permission, that can cause some feature cannot be used or can cause the application cannot run normaly.
How to solve the problem that not in help list?
You can send an email to pals@gopals.esy.es if have problems or questions.
